Articles.Content: adding the HARM would be fine except if i did i would want it to have an anti-radiation capability and we have a lot of missiles at this point

Technically yes that is certainly possible but Im going to have to put it on the back burner for now. Without a guidance system to make it unique it seems unnessesary with two stock AGMs and another 4 of my own. If there is a specific need for this weapon such as a YouTube series or other project I can put one together but for now I want to finish my project then add to it later. This isn't a no Just a hold on for a bit.

Progress update

Yesterday I finished the textures and unity packages for the AIM-27 R-37 GBU-57A and I rebuilt the BLU-82

Today I will attempt to get them all working properly and try to get a release out in the next few days once my armor pieces are also working.
